channel.title: Rebecca Ferguson on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Rebecca Ferguson on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘A House of Dynamite’ Review: Idris Elba and Rebecca Ferguson in Kathryn Bigelow’s Precision-Tooled, Viscerally Unsettling Nail-Biter
item.description: The Netflix thriller captures from multiple perspectives the White House response to an unattributed missile launch headed for a major U.S. city in the harrowing 20 minutes until projected impact.
